OK, I have a seperate EXE that allows loading of a saved network and 
then displays an actual prey capture simulation. It needs updating and 
cleaning up a bit but it's essentially all there. I'll post a message 
when it's ready.

Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>Colin, one suggestion I have is to make it possible to view champion
>networks playing the predator-prey domain, in other words to be able
>to see the predator and prey running around.  That would be a nice
>demo.
>
>  
>
